topbanner.title: Munich 2021
topbanner.description: OYW - The annual One Young World convened the brightest young talent from every country and sector, working to accelerate social impact.

headers.topbanner: Our world needs great leadership. The new generation is one of the most informed, educated and well connected generations in world history. One Young World identifies, promotes and connects the most impactful young leaders across the globe to create a better world: a world with more responsible and effective leadership.
headers.sub-header: Virufy has been featured on various OYW platforms, including in the Americas and Japan, ambassadors in action , and ambassadors on the frontline for COVID-19 response . We are also collaborating with OYW coordinating ambassadors across various regions for outreach efforts.
headers.help: Help us bring Virufy to hospitals and communities near you! Together, we will transform healthcare and stop the spread of COVID. And this is just the beginning - join us in the fight against future pandemics, too!

section1.header: Check us out at the OYW 2021 Summit on 25 July 2021:
section1.sub-header: Yulie Qiao, Virufy’s Operations Lead, will be speaking during the COVID-19 Plenary Session.
section1.sub-header2: Learn more about Virufy at the Digital Exhibition.

sectionHi.amil: Amil Khanzada - OYW Japan Ambassador & Virufy’s Founder and CEO
sectionHi.yulie: Yulie Qiao - bp delegate, USA & Virufy Operations
sectionHi.ayomide: Ayomide Owoyemi, MD - Novartis delegate, Nigeria & Virufy ML Clinical Stats
sectionHi.shreya: Shreya Shreeram, MD - Virufy delegate, India & Virufy Clinical Research
sectionHi.join: You can be part of the solution! Visit our Join Page for open volunteering opportunities and also check out the Virufy OYW playbook.

section2.title: Why One Young World?
section2.sub-header: Collect data and provide equitable solutions for people in developing countries across the world.
section2.youth-des: Our growing team is led by youth from over a dozen countries and are advised by global leaders.
section2.ambassador-des: Our organization structure matches One Young World with youth ambassadors leading operations in each country, with regional coordinating ambassadors.
section2.diverse-des: Our team has representation from over 25 universities and 15 countries and includes more than 10 One Young World ambassadors.

lauravelasquezh.name: Laura Velasquez
lauravelasquezh.descriptionVirufy: Arkangel AI Co-founder and President & Virufy Partner

testimonials.title: Volunteer Stories
testimonials.intro: Our team is led by students dedicated to social good from reputable institutions like Stanford, Princeton, and One Young World. We have strong trust in members of the One Young World community and warmly welcome any ambassadors interested to pitch in.
testimonials.annelisse: “Having suffered through COVID myself along with all of my family in a underprivileged country, I knew instantly that I could make a difference and prevent others from facing my same fate by joining Virufy.”
testimonials.sebastian: “Virufy unites the power of youth and technology to transform the world. We hope that this solution will reach the whole world and that it will become a support for doctors, especially in low-income countries.”
testimonials.gonzalo: “Virufy will impact globally, no matter the users' background or social status. This is what changing the status quo feels like.”
testimonials.marcos: “I think that Virufy will develop a very accurate solution and this will be useful for the entire world in every industry. So I encourage everyone to take some minutes and contribute with us.”
